data: [[1446780,[["GC_Award_N_MR_42",{"strName":"狩猎者的银盾","strDescription":"狩猎了500头大师等级的大型怪物的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/651ae29f3cc7b5c594ebf4d0c4a9c21ea071f1ec.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.9000000953674316}],["GC_Award_N_MR_17",{"strName":"琥珀胸针","strDescription":"在城塞高地完成50次任务的证明。嵌着闪亮琥珀的胸针。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/83f9fa26abadafe3a12d24c9992f66b26b13a960.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":9}],["GC_Award_N_MR_24",{"strName":"超越者的红带","strDescription":"获得了更多替换技的证明。千锤百炼的技艺卓越非凡，甚至已是人力所不能及。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/b53cabaead6097da329709cb9ab7a064dd798b83.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.7999999523162842}],["GC_Award_N_MR_25",{"strName":"气派的头盔","strDescription":"生产了更多贵重武器防具的证明。酷炫的头盔上带有气派的羽毛。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/8611b25eb83a04f7b71c57d0018b4a11b7564faf.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":19.100000381469727}],["GC_Award_N_MR_31",{"strName":"秘传的蜜瓶","strDescription":"团子美食家的证明，证明用跃动竹签吃过许多团子。浇上蜂蜜，幸福满满。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/8da9f53d0f3785ef50572231242f9a2dbb315dd3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":18}],["GC_Award_N_MR_33",{"strName":"舶来的项链","strDescription":"让随从带上介绍信进行许多次交易的证明。不知不觉间随从就持有了这条项链。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/c676310519447a511beae653e95063bb1e23197a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":19.899999618530273}],["GC_Award_N_MR_35",{"strName":"牙猎犬的香脆派","strDescription":"让牙猎犬学会各种技巧的证明。奖给努力学习的牙猎犬，奖励香脆可口。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/d767398bda8c48cf87279c956fa11c9c3c6f1166.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":18}],["GC_Award_N_MR_37",{"strName":"防风围巾","strDescription":"使用很多次迅速切换之书的证明。能够迎风而上，在猎场上自由地驰骋。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/ffcbf9b3dfa184df2255ca1e501f41ba5f037dd9.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":18.700000762939453}],["GC_Award_N_MR_38",{"strName":"勾玉草盆栽","strDescription":"借助变幻翔虫的力量进行过各种御龙的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/d12903d152fbcb9406099248e0490ed10c64194d.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":24.799999237060547}],["GC_Award_N_MR_41",{"strName":"狩猎者的铜盾","strDescription":"狩猎了100头大师等级的大型怪物的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/51ff886f1f521f776b3133288f13aa7ceff3f6ee.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":21.299999237060547}],["GC_Award_N_MR_46",{"strName":"讨伐怪异的白银奖杯","strDescription":"首次讨伐怪异化怪物的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/1b7b04d0535d7bbca1841bbc0acba74c4c01ce0c.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":23.100000381469727}],["GC_Award_N_MR_01",{"strName":"王国的协助委托书","strDescription":"受王国委托，去协助观测据点的证明。王国正式发给村子猎人的委托书。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/c861207ff8f9eebc5114106d7a0ad90cd393ccee.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":27.799999237060547}],["GC_Award_N_MR_02",{"strName":"远眺的望远镜","strDescription":"为调查而奋斗的证明。崭新的望远镜能够清晰地看到远处的事物。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/4f27e9f9206f1a22fc0edd126731ee57701ac0a0.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":27.200000762939453}],["GC_Award_N_MR_03",{"strName":"调查专用披风","strDescription":"成功狩猎刚缠兽的证明。即使在极其严酷的调查环境中，也能保护穿戴者。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/27ffbd879c30d29cf2241e48cf928a290d01f7ec.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":26.5}],["GC_Award_N_MR_04",{"strName":"蓝羽毛钢笔","strDescription":"成功狩猎冰狼龙的证明。菲奥莱娜赠送的礼物，饰有美丽蓝羽毛的钢笔。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/fea198fd5fbccfbc8811597a81b314df22b84ac9.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":25.600000381469727}],["GC_Award_N_MR_05",{"strName":"庄严的小旗帜","strDescription":"成功讨伐爵银龙的证明。庄严的王国桌上旗帜，证明了持有者的战功。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/05a33e36941cc3ac3f4cc5859f311d94d2c14028.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":24.5}],["GC_Award_N_MR_06",{"strName":"王国的协助感谢状","strDescription":"为王国和平作出极大贡献的身经百战的猎人之证。王国正式授予的协助感谢状。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/42806b4f500164bb24dd498c24a704bc9836d427.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":23.600000381469727}],["GC_Award_N_MR_12",{"strName":"友情双杯","strDescription":"与很多盟友缔结深厚牵绊的证明。据说以此杯共饮，能加深双方的友谊。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/5331b6e399f9e14bb8c62bba59b367a9bf8758bb.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.099999904632568}],["GC_Award_N_MR_47",{"strName":"討伐傀異的黃金獎盃","strDescription":"討伐了100頭傀異化魔物的證明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/2cf0d44a81c431cff3d5e045e001d8d9a6b9d5d1.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.199999809265137}],["GC_Award_N_MR_26",{"strName":"奢华的头盔","strDescription":"生产了更多贵重外观装备的证明。帅气的头盔上带有奢华的金色雕刻以及蓝色羽毛。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/23dd9c12625d4e9737ad062584d168fb77f9de73.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.800000190734863}],["GC_Award_N_MR_13",{"strName":"绘画【红色的噩梦】","strDescription":"完成诸多怪异任务的证明。画上的啮生虫毛骨悚然。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/a5a81af468c624c4994041bf3924b3de4b5ae8e1.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.599999904632568}],["GC_Award_N_MR_18",{"strName":"海藍色的護身符","strDescription":"在密林完成任務50次的證明。祈求遠洋航海平安無事的護身符。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/6eb187d16158dbee1c7df6b63a54333c949d7d13.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7}],["GC_Award_N_MR_19",{"strName":"情意花束","strDescription":"无论在村庄还是在观测据点，承接并解决各种委托的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/30842f74655c51dd1cb4a9bef37d32f1c5c97417.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.299999952316284}],["GC_Award_N_MR_20",{"strName":"顺手的扎营套件","strDescription":"解锁了众多密林和城塞高地营地的证明。闭着眼睛都能方便地扎营。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/4d33b0fe899a6dbf3b430d23341f1736398807ec.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":13.399999618530273}],["GC_Award_N_MR_21",{"strName":"大翔虫纪念奖章","strDescription":"发现了众多密林和城塞高地大翔虫设置点的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/54b85d055fc984a0b63beb76ee5b03cfeb4eaa13.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.200000047683716}],["GC_Award_N_MR_22",{"strName":"完好无损的书签","strDescription":"在密林和城塞高地找到了诸多手记的证明。和手记一起被发现的旧物没有丝毫老化。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/db063cf89349a2473d55b1998fc0ab7dfc7760bd.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.7000000476837158}],["GC_Award_N_MR_23",{"strName":"自然相框","strDescription":"拍摄了诸多主要栖息在密林与城塞高地生物的证明。照片的相框很雅致，能凸显照片。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/a536d4aea8bb09cc7efd2a3f684de161c2889a93.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1}],["GC_Award_N_MR_29",{"strName":"牢固的锁","strDescription":"收集到更多摆设和壁饰的证明。这把锁坚不可摧，就算用尽全力也纹丝不动。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/64ee967a2a7a31025381a73d24878f9624e5f9c2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2}],["GC_Award_N_MR_30",{"strName":"巨匠的杵臼","strDescription":"离开村子来到埃尔迦德之后也帮助茶点店制作新团子的证明。生意兴隆！","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/be8bf908a0c9899a3882522829f0b63139f9b160.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.900000095367432}],["GC_Award_N_MR_32",{"strName":"睡午覺的艾路＆加爾克","strDescription":"能夠在隨從道場學習各種技巧的證明。和樂融融地依偎在一起的加爾克玩偶和艾路玩偶。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/0e0153c041f79ff50a1418c853b78bc694851d68.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.199999809265137}],["GC_Award_N_MR_34",{"strName":"随从的呼唤笛","strDescription":"解锁诸多侦察地点的证明。质朴的笛声能传到遥远的地方。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/92b663dd51e0e1a95c2890da0ba327e332f3bcb2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.4000000953674316}],["GC_Award_N_MR_36",{"strName":"五彩斑斓的橡子","strDescription":"拥有许多技能记忆力出色的随从的证明。用颜料上色的可爱橡子。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/201f7b735ef1e4e1961ab92e3cef88222c30aad4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.5}],["GC_Award_N_MR_39",{"strName":"不会破的大口袋","strDescription":"在各地收到很多物品的证明。没想到会连袋子一起收到……","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/bd5a19ed4248434210b2ef8f03388aa0a915fd5f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.600000023841858}],["GC_Award_N_MR_40",{"strName":"轻快凉鞋","strDescription":"和诸多观测据点的人对话的证明。一下就能穿上，穿上立刻就能跑，很适合在外出时穿的凉鞋。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/bc88b404f82b0d85d03c77be28bbb9451a7759c2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.5}],["GC_Award_N_MR_44",{"strName":"狩猎小冠的装饰盾","strDescription":"在狩猎记录中，获得几乎所有怪物最小金冠的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/faed62a302086db6e8c66336c4d80a3160fdfc2a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":0.4000000059604645}],["GC_Award_N_MR_45",{"strName":"狩猎金冠的装饰盾","strDescription":"在狩猎记录中，获得几乎所有怪物最大金冠的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/d0b92faedb82fc558890c1020131c1c73262b1ee.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":0.4000000059604645}],["GC_Award_N_MR_07",{"strName":"究极猎人传奇【大师】","strDescription":"完成诸多集会所大师等级任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/5cd3bf6006bdd1147abd4fb9c34d0d14f03fdb0e.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.299999952316284}],["GC_Award_N_MR_08",{"strName":"白色福木兔小口袋","strDescription":"与居住在埃尔迦德的白色福木兔幼雏关系好的证明。外形小，大容量。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/afc84aaad4c3e83a28168d88f4a8292b6413492f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.199999809265137}],["GC_Award_N_MR_09",{"strName":"究极猎人传奇【斗技】","strDescription":"完成更多斗技大会任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/e8e57e227ad94da35d48b9aa477c4ebb4f1d57ee.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.399999976158142}],["GC_Award_N_MR_10",{"strName":"绘画【异乡的捻线】","strDescription":"完成诸多盟友同行任务的证明。祝福村庄与观测据点永结盟好的绘画。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/49c0ecb460df5d1c2c37fbd0c7187f0a1bd78e23.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.400000095367432}],["GC_Award_N_MR_11",{"strName":"绘画【青澄的要地】","strDescription":"完成诸多重要调查任务的证明。遨游于蓝天的悠然模样栩栩如生。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/cb9e4896eeafe8aeb0e5e41abfd3a5885961168d.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.9000000953674316}],["GC_Award_N_25",{"strName":"金灵瓢虫彩瓷","strDescription":"累计收集1000只金灵瓢虫、黄金灵瓢虫的证明。跃然其上的金灵瓢虫生动美丽。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/4438c45e33a48888161f76d3b3615fd85f377f12.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3}],["GC_Award_N_50",{"strName":"狩猎金冠绘马","strDescription":"在狩猎记录中，获得诸多怪物最大金冠的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/eb9d05fffa13905cbb077c03947b6d94d9f73f04.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.100000023841858}],["GC_Award_N_46",{"strName":"千头狩猎绘马","strDescription":"狩猎了1000头大型怪物的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/1d3f00d8ad0ce2e6ad17d8982b8f2bba08fbb818.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.9000000953674316}],["GC_Award_N_13",{"strName":"优秀猎人之卷【斗技】","strDescription":"完成诸多斗技大会任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/843e1aa8dee6f1377fba8cae9b5ac75c50e61200.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":3.5999999046325684}],["GC_Award_N_41",{"strName":"达人的黑带","strDescription":"获得了诸多替换技的证明。不仅仅是技艺，身体与精神也久经锻炼的人才会被授予此证。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/4cfdbb385bfc1f45347aca87d6002213f9f8709a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.700000047683716}],["GC_Award_N_27",{"strName":"钓竿【每投必中】","strDescription":"成功钓上诸多鱼类的证明。无名钓竿在不经意间变得顺手，成为了每投必中的名竿。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/a359bcf000a3122089e344a66612bef0b7c9b0b1.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.0999999046325684}],["GC_Award_N_43",{"strName":"坚固的锁","strDescription":"收集到诸多摆设和立轴的证明。此锁形制坚牢稳固，可保重要物品不致失窃。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/bc5eee76b76b67925b0ad0f567b0c489ba8241e2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.099999904632568}],["GC_Award_N_21",{"strName":"磨损的牙猎犬鞍","strDescription":"多次骑乘牙猎犬的证明。经历过漫长旅程，犬鞍的磨损程度非同寻常。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/3d5c590a299d9de6b57a4f1e3836b66fc26935f2.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":18.799999237060547}],["GC_Award_N_34",{"strName":"随从们的感谢状","strDescription":"雇用过50个随从的证明。谢谢你给了我们好多工作机会喵。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/310edaaf8de012593573d03f5d1c4e682b6cdfb6.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":6.400000095367432}],["GC_Award_N_45",{"strName":"走不累木屐","strDescription":"曾和诸多村民对话的证明。穿上它，走路如履绒毯，让人丝毫感觉不到疲劳。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/cd9e5c577a6e23fd76d63cff00515ae704a2317a.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":4.5}],["GC_Award_N_28",{"strName":"烤肉大师","strDescription":"成功烤出30次烤熟的肉的证明。此证书由名为烤肉推进会的可疑团体颁发。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/fade54d9440434f91b94466975184973fea475b7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.9000000953674316}],["GC_Award_N_49",{"strName":"狩猎小冠绘马","strDescription":"在狩猎记录中，获得诸多怪物最小金冠的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/cb91a78d777a11dea444d828584c9eb1e321bd94.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":1.100000023841858}],["GC_Award_N_37",{"strName":"猎犬具保养道具","strDescription":"收集到众多猎犬具的证明。想要长久使用，每日的保养必不可少。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/05c31d6c7e21a327b1127c69aaaf5714ad93aa6f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":24.100000381469727}],["GC_Award_N_24",{"strName":"猎具生物彩瓷","strDescription":"累计获得500次猎具生物的证明。跃然其上的猎具生物生动美丽。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/74e6123073af676f4eb33a3e44c268ce65dcd1bd.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.800000190734863}],["GC_Award_N_33",{"strName":"陈旧的钱箱","strDescription":"累计获得10万炎火点数的证明。虽然久经使用，但手感顺滑且充满光泽。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/abf00fe245ef361af820f0f2365f36546df16ee7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":47.29999923706055}],["GC_Award_N_20",{"strName":"炎火村风车","strDescription":"发动疾翔进行移动，累计达到1000次的证明。乘风千里适吾意。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/e932a063396b09a62d08e9f6dda3a0b43d9f9cef.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":50}],["GC_Award_N_38",{"strName":"高级铠甲装饰","strDescription":"生产了诸多贵重武器防具的证明。选材讲究，与真品别无二致。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/6a89b4b7e3aac304456f704207f7ca837346d1a0.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":44.70000076293945}],["GC_Award_N_48",{"strName":"御龙高手绘马","strDescription":"驾驭过诸多怪物的证明。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/f953e22f25037033c74858ae269b26a6c94132ac.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":47.599998474121094}],["GC_Award_N_32",{"strName":"豪华的钱箱","strDescription":"累计赚取100万金钱的证明。豪华的真金工艺，使其比看起来更为沉重。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/8b4dcd36433002cc0ab4bb43214c93335a372ca7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":47.29999923706055}],["GC_Award_N_11",{"strName":"优秀猎人之卷【上位】","strDescription":"完成诸多集会所上位任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/c31999420469412e36a8972d82b3d61d7968a54e.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.400000095367432}],["GC_Award_N_08",{"strName":"安宁成就折扇","strDescription":"唯有竟狩猎之极者可挑战难关，此为称霸该难关任务者的证明。描绘着鏖战之景的折扇。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/a04be34a9d2039056707f11b447d6f23f70d2624.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":11.199999809265137}],["GC_Award_N_40",{"strName":"花链装饰瓶","strDescription":"获得了诸多花链的证明。以之装饰房屋，室内会充满馨香。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/da25cee523b504520da197dfc66dbd4e8c0a8cbe.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":31.399999618530273}],["GC_Award_N_44",{"strName":"福木兔专用衣箱","strDescription":"热爱福木兔服装之人的证明。专门制造的衣箱，可以妥善收纳福木兔的服装。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/07d1446b9152a363da5a10a723f716898d7cedd3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":36}],["GC_Award_N_04",{"strName":"霸主小太刀","strDescription":"成功击退百龙夜行霸主的证明。化为武器的锐爪上残留的伤痕，讲述着原主波澜壮阔的一生。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/c36c01f2859cca82536d83f328143f5c205c7139.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":66.9000015258789}],["GC_Award_N_05",{"strName":"风神龙击退画卷","strDescription":"成功击退风神龙的证明。授予的这副画卷中，由岁丰稔绘制了退敌始末。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/f011c91fdc3c772cc1d3f1e313b538a7d4ed14b3.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":57.400001525878906}],["GC_Award_N_22",{"strName":"陈旧的扎营套件","strDescription":"解锁了诸多营地的证明。其上遍布的伤痕，都有着一一对应的回忆。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/bcee69f441e1ba5203c71a641925a4b3c2107775.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":25.5}],["GC_Award_N_02",{"strName":"炎火村护符","strDescription":"成为炎火村猎人的证明。授予此证，愿君平安狩猎。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/01c4593add4173fdfdfcf8e50b6e99438c7895e8.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":91.19999694824219}],["GC_Award_N_03",{"strName":"炎火村宝刀","strDescription":"成功狩猎怨虎龙的证明。村中代代相传的宝刀，是村众指引者的象征。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/6b34be035f7e6fc366e8235d1264fb9e5d1d1ba7.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":57}],["GC_Award_N_06",{"strName":"百龙夜行画卷","strDescription":"成功击退风神龙和雷神龙的证明。描绘着百龙夜行的古老画卷上，有岁丰稔添补的两头巨龙。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/3a0bc706497e1fc333620b4d4127faaf5c820956.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":54.099998474121094}],["GC_Award_N_07",{"strName":"凶星击退折扇","strDescription":"成功击退威胁村庄的异形天彗龙的证明。精美的折扇上描绘着英雄对战神秘红光的风采。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/6af2e7191897f3b0ae5fd801169c868ea24c65ae.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":35.599998474121094}],["GC_Award_N_09",{"strName":"真・安宁成就折扇","strDescription":"称霸狱泉乡最难关任务，接近猎人之极致的证明。描绘着激战霸主之景的折扇。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/618cd9cb41a045d130e39773608f782895df0705.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":8.300000190734863}],["GC_Award_N_10",{"strName":"优秀猎人之卷【下位】","strDescription":"完成诸多集会所下位任务的证明。公会赠予的纪念品。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/976d8b285c228369d28ff49535d1b310d630cdc6.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":10.300000190734863}],["GC_Award_N_MR_27",{"strName":"加工店的特製手套","strDescription":"對多項武器進行過傀異鍊成的證明。戴上這個手套後，無論拿取多麼危險的素材都能安然無恙。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/f46a7b70528d6549bdc859ee74e7a01804ea807c.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":5.699999809265137}],["GC_Award_N_MR_28",{"strName":"加工店的秘藏工具","strDescription":"對多項防具進行過傀異鍊成的證明。無論面對多麼脆弱的寶石都能毫髮無損地完美切削。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/37b9e8d51fc6907a8c8f71a99dcdbe97bcac05d0.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.300000190734863}],["GC_Award_N_MR_14",{"strName":"傀異研究調查書","strDescription":"給予在研究傀異方面有深遠貢獻之人的證明。詳細記載著傀異化的原理。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/ee72a12c12c42a7e548542986c18d8cd0f93120f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":7.400000095367432}],["GC_Award_N_17",{"strName":"白銀仙人掌戒指","strDescription":"在沙原完成任務50次的證明。銀白色的稀有仙人掌戒指。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/33737246fe5a2f3053d3c54b0e721c056ab4f73f.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":17.899999618530273}],["GC_Award_N_18",{"strName":"碧赤岩手環","strDescription":"在熔岩洞完成任務50次的證明。紅色與藍色結晶完美融合在一起。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/e01d0712b7edc6e403259826e5840740073980c4.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":15.300000190734863}],["GC_Award_N_MR_15",{"strName":"深紅色精氣琥珀","strDescription":"此證明僅授予完成極高難度傀異探究任務之人。","strImage":"https://steamcdn-a.akamaihd.net/steamcommunity/public/images/apps/1446780/ea6da8c2e1c47c084a775db026b480bd920695ae.jpg","bAchieved":true,"flAchieved":2.700000047683716}]]]]

vecHighlight.strDescription: 在密林完成任務50次的證明。祈求遠洋航海平安無事的護身符。
此證明僅授予完成極高難度傀異探究任務之人。
在熔岩洞完成任務50次的證明。紅色與藍色結晶完美融合在一起。
討伐了100頭傀異化魔物的證明。
在沙原完成任務50次的證明。銀白色的稀有仙人掌戒指。
對多項防具進行過傀異鍊成的證明。無論面對多麼脆弱的寶石都能毫髮無損地完美切削。
對多項武器進行過傀異鍊成的證明。戴上這個手套後，無論拿取多麼危險的素材都能安然無恙。
給予在研究傀異方面有深遠貢獻之人的證明。詳細記載著傀異化的原理。
能夠在隨從道場學習各種技巧的證明。和樂融融地依偎在一起的加爾克玩偶和艾路玩偶。
狩獵了500頭Master Rank大型魔物的證明。
狩獵了冰狼龍的證明。由菲歐莉尼所贈，有著美麗藍羽毛點綴的鋼筆。
討伐爵銀龍的證明。威風凜凜的王國桌上旗，為持有者的功勳之證。

vecUnachieved.strDescription: 完成許多支線任務的證明。花束裡頭包含著許多人的感謝之意。
派遣隨從隱密隊出任務累計100次的證明。
在寒冷群島完成任務50次的證明。從上古時代冰凍至今的珍寶。
大量騎乘加爾克的證明。無數次的南征北討，在鞍上留下了非比尋常的磨損。
在水沒林完成任務50次的證明。埋藏在遺跡深處的秘寶。
在密林和城塞高地開放許多營地的證明。用法簡單，讓人閉著眼睛也能設置營地。
致力於充實茶館菜單的證明。耳邊彷彿能聽見茶館的喧鬧聲。
完成超難任務的證明。唯有達到狩獵巔峰之人才能挑戰此任務。扇子上畫下了這場激烈的戰鬥。
將各種支援類型的隨從艾路鍛鍊至最大Lv的證明。
完成許多集會所初階任務的證明。公會贈送的紀念品。
累計取得500次獵具生物的證明。上頭畫的獵具生物十分美麗。
與許多盟友締結深厚情誼的證明。據說只要以此杯共飲，便能加深彼此之間的友誼。

data.strFullDescription:
狩獵本能躍動！
為狩獵掀起新風潮、無拘無束地躍動的動作；可隨心所欲地奔馳的新原野；帶來未知的興奮和驚喜的全新魔物。
在《MONSTER HUNTER RISE》中，前所未見的狩獵體驗正等候著獵人們！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/01_マルチ_full.gif?t=1664498264[/img]

[b]・掀起全新風潮的「翔蟲」動作[/b]
翔蟲能飛往獵人指示的方向，並以特殊的「鐵蟲絲」把獵人拉到目的地。翔蟲為狩獵帶來進化，只要配合各武器種類的特色攻擊，便能誕生出新的狩獵動作！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/02_翔蟲.gif?t=1664498264[/img]

[b]・操縱魔物的豪邁動作「操龍」[/b]
操縱兇猛暴虐的魔物，使出豪邁的動作！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/03_操竜.gif?t=1664498264[/img]

[b]・支援狩獵的隨從們[/b]
除了老拍檔「隨從艾路」之外，還有可靠的「隨從加爾克」全新登場！
[img]https://cdn.akamai.steamstatic.com/steam/apps/1446780/extras/04_ガルク走り.gif?t=1664498264[/img]

[b]・神火村的故事[/b]
神火村因即將面臨時隔50年的災禍──「百龍夜行」而陷入窘境。
主角需一邊以成為頂尖獵人為目標而鍛鍊自身，一邊與村莊的同伴合力克服這場災禍。
[b]
・魔物大舉侵襲的「百龍夜行」[/b]
所謂「百龍夜行」，是指眾多魔物及由其帶領的「魔物群」進行的襲擊。
原野上滿佈著大型魔物……

[b]・擁有獨特生態的魔物[/b]
以本作的象徵魔物──怨虎龍為首，擁有獨特生態的未知魔物及系列魔物將陸續登場！
data.strSnippet: 狩獵本能躍動！ 為狩獵掀起全新風潮、無拘無束地躍動的動作；可隨心所欲地奔馳的新原野；帶來未知的興奮和驚喜的全新魔物。 在《MONSTER HUNTER RISE》中，前所未見的狩獵體驗正等候著獵人們！
